scripts.start: cross-env MODE=local S=0 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.userscrape: cross-env MODE=local S=1 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.tagscrape: cross-env MODE=local S=2 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.usersfind: cross-env MODE=local S=3 node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod
scripts.test: cross-env MODE=test node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
